changelog: Fix: On-call calculation now uses actual work hours (endTime - startTime)
Previously used Schmutzzulage (surcharge), now uses clock times
Pause and travel time not subtracted from on-call (only work duration matters)
Multi-period on-call system: Support unlimited on-call periods
Period numbering: Each period gets a unique ID (#1, #2, #3...)
Month-end handling: Periods crossing months split at boundaries
Only one period active at a time with visual badge on button
Export improvements: Multiple periods shown in CSV and Excel
